text: This 24-hour McDonald's, like many others, suffers from a slightly grimy atmosphere despite it being clean. Located on the ground floor of an older HDB block, it caters primarily to the immediate neighborhood. While convenient to Braddell MRT, its overall ambiance leaves something to be desired. Given the choice, I'd opt for a McDonald's located at Toa Payoh hub.

Just have to submit a review about the curry chicken McNuggets. I’m not sure what happened to the recipe but the batter and chicken meat were dry and hard like stone. I’ve not tried the nuggets in a while but my memory of the curry McNuggets was a crispy thin crust and succulent chicken meat inside. It’s a far cry from what it used to be, and quite inedible.

I ordered a bagel sausage and litterally paid 6.80 for mushroom , cheese ,egg and bagel? (Fact is this aint the first time they got my items wrong either 1 i am unlucky as heck or 2 they aint doing their job properly)
And always i get less den what i paid for

Worst fried chicken, like fried multiple times, meat is dry, filled with stale oil taste. I will never order McD fried chicken again. Shop so stingy that i have ask for napkins from the counter, and every tine 3 pcs.
My food less “EVM M Tw Fries”，the staff never check properly mine food. This is Low-level errors.Pls take noted please. wasting my time and transport fee to collect my Tw Fries …
